snippet.title: Official Swords and Soldiers 2 Shawarmageddon release trailer I Nintendo Switch
snippet.description: The action-packed side-scrolling strategy game is out now for the Switch! Join a war between Vikings, Persians and Demons for the perfect shawarma - play the 10 hour single-player campaign or battle it out in local splitscreen and online multiplayer!
